Comodo Internet Secutiry detects malware in Setup.exe, Trojware.win32 injection. Is this ok? Should I proceed with instalation?

if you get virus warning when installing games, disable antivirus before u start to install the game, after installation, patching and cracking is complete reenable antivirus and add your game's directory to exclusion list (or what ever other name your anti virus uses for files/folders that will not be scanned for viruses).
